subject: College Athletics
Football
lead_paragraph: John Skelton set single-game Fordham passing records with 43 completions, 67 attempts and 427 yards, but the Rams remained winless in the Patriot League.
snippet: John Skelton set single-game Fordham passing records with 43 completions, 67 attempts and 427 yards, but the Rams remained winless in the Patriot League.
